DOC.brief_summary: We hypothesize that topical betaxolol will reduce the development of severe retinopathy of prematurity.
DOC.brief_title: Topical Betaxolol for the Prevention of Retinopathy of Prematurity
DOC.detailed_description: The drug is administered twice a day between 32 and 35 weeks gestational age, at a t ime when ROP is most likely to arise.
